page.header: The power to make an impact

application-form.consent: To the best of my knowledge, all information above is true and accurate, and I consent to sharing my response with Employment and Social Development Canada

personal-information.canadien-citizen-or-procted-person: Are you a Canadian citizen, permanent resident, or protected person? (A procted person is a person on whom refugee protection is conferred under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, and whose claim or application has not subsequently been deemed to be rejected under subsection 108(3), 109(3) or 114(4) or that Act.
personal-information.education-level: What is your highest level of formal education completed, or enrolled in currently? (Please note that there is no education requirement for this program)
personal-information.gender: To which gender identity do you most identify?
personal-information.major-age: I certify that I am over the age of majority in my province
personal-information.prefered-contact-language: In which official language would you prefer to be contacted?
personal-information.province: Which province or territory is your principle residence?

expression-of-interest-questions.about-yourself: Tell us about yourself, describe your strengths, passions and what motivates you. What skills or knowledge can you bring to the Canada Service Corps Civic Engagement Pilot?
expression-of-interest-questions.access-dedicated-device: Do you have access to a dedecated device on which to work?
expression-of-interest-questions.facilitate-participation: Is there anything else you want us to know about you or is there something we could do that facilitate your participation in this program?
expression-of-interest-questions.internet-access: Do you have access to reliable internet?
expression-of-interest-questions.part-csc-pilot: Why do you want to be part of Canada Service Corps Civic Engagement Pilot? How do you plan on using what you learn during your Canada Service Corps experience in your community after the program?
expression-of-interest-questions.positive-impact: If you could make a positive impact on one issue in your community what issue would you want to address and why?
